Module rrpss
Package order

Class Order

java.lang.Object
order.Order
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Order extends Object implements Serializable
An order is created when a customer places an order with the restaurant. It contains a list of order menu items and a list of promotion packages that has been added to this order
Author:
Trevor
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order​(int orderId, int staffId, int customerId, int tableId, Calendar timestamp)
      This creates an order, as well as the lists of ala carte items and promotion packages
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order
      staffId - The ID of the staff creating this order
      customerId - The ID of the customer making this order
      tableId - The ID of the table for which this order is made for
      timestamp - The time that this order has been made
